message:
Could any one help me to solve this exception:
I have published an arc gis map on arc gis (local) server  as a service
I want to consume it in windows phone 8 app 
using Arc Gis Phone SDK for .Net 
when I run the emulator I found 
[An exception of type 'System.Reflection.TargetInvocationException' ]occurred in System.ni.dll but was not handled in user code]
the inner exception details : the remote server reply with  not found 
I can't find any solution and this exception appears with all code samples :(

data.message:
What version of ArcGIS Server?
Can you track the traffic between the emulator and the server?
From the inner exception details, it seems that you used the wrong the URL for ArcGIS Server. You can't use "localhost" to refer to AGS on your machine, you have to use the machine name.
I 've tried writing machine IP but it didn't work
I'm assuming that the emulator is connected to the same network as the machine, right?
Now I'm trying to publish my maps on arc gis online account  I've created an application to get a token so that I can access the service using REST  there is no exception but my map doesn't appear :(
Use Fiddler to examine the traffic between the emulator and the server. It should give you more details on the cause of the error.
Okay, now that's a different problem. Let's work one at a time :)
Also, from the emulator, browse (from IE for example) to the Services Directory of AGS and see if you can reach that location.
when browsing the service I found it
It  is Working  :) Thanx very much ^_^
